co.paralleluniverse.data.record

Interface SealedRecordType<R>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecordType

    public interface SealedRecordType<R>

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getName()
      This type's name
      boolean isInstance(Record<?> record)
      Test's whether a record is an instance of this type (or one of its subtypes).

      Creates an new RecordArray instance of this type.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        This type's name

      • isInstance

        boolean isInstance(Record<?> record)
        Test's whether a record is an instance of this type (or one of its subtypes).
        Parameters:
        record - the record to test
        Returns:
        true if record is an instance of this type (or one of its subtypes); false otherwise.

      • newInstance

        Record<R> newInstance()
        Creates an new record instance of this type. The returned implementation stores the record in an efficient memory representation.
        Returns:
        a newly constructed record of this type.

      • wrap

        Record<R> wrap(Object target)
        Wraps a given object with a record instance of this type. The record's fields are mapped to the target's fields or getters/setters of the same name. Changes to the record will be reflected in the target object and vice versa.

        The record's implementation Mode mode will be the best (fastest) one available for the target's class.

        Parameters:
        target - the POJO to wrap as a record
        Returns:
        a newly constructed record of this type, which reflects target.

      • wrap

        Record<R> wrap(Object target,
             RecordType.Mode mode)
        Wraps a given object with a record instance of this type. The record's fields are mapped to the target's fields or getters/setters of the same name. Changes to the record will be reflected in the target object and vice versa.
        Parameters:
        target - the POJO to wrap as a record
        mode - the record's implementation Mode mode.
        Returns:
        a newly constructed record of this type, which reflects target.

      • newArray

        RecordArray<R> newArray(int size)
        Creates an new RecordArray instance of this type. The returned implementation stores the record array in an efficient memory representation.
        Returns:
        a newly constructed record array of this type.
